GMCM.tooltip.magnificationCoefficient: The coefficient of money deducted for upgrading items.
GMCM.tooltip.toggleKeyForUpgrade: The key to be pressed for an upgrade.
GMCM.tooltip.HUDMessagesOnToggle: If enabled, there will be several messages when the 'Toggle Key' is pressed.
GMCM.tooltip.autoUpgradeOnPick: If enabled, picked-up items will automatically upgrade.
GMCM.tooltip.deductMoneyOnAutoUpgrade: If enabled, money will be deducted when items are automatically upgraded upon pick-up.
GMCM.tooltip.AnimalProduct: Enable or disable Animal Product options
GMCM.tooltip.FishingTackle: Enable or disable Fishing Tackle options
GMCM.tooltip.ArtisanGoods: Enable or disable Artisan Goods options
GMCM.tooltip.MonsterLoot: Enable or disable Monster Loot options
HUDMessage.highestQuality: The item has achieved the highest quality.
HUDMessage.succeedUpgrade: Successfully upgraded the item, at a cost of {{upgradeCost}}G.
